reviewText: This is a great video to show to children to learn about animals. It is great for adults to learn about animals. With Dudley Moore narrating the whole whole polar region of the South Pole,North Pole,and More. It leads you through the Arctic with fun songs and funny jokes the whole family will enjoy. You will see great shots of polar bears and kodiak bears. Anybody who loves bears will love this video. There are also various varieties of penguins from all kinds of different places. There are also Various types of seals,walruses,whales,birds and more. It is also filled with fun facts so you and the kids can understand it. A must have for any animal lover.

We own all of the tapes in this series and think that this and Swinging Safari are the two best.  The photography is great, the music is wonderful, and Dudley Moore's narration is perfect.  Great for kids of all ages and adults as well.
Was teaching unit on Arctic and Antarctic habitats.  This video was a good fit for my class of middle school students with special needs. Fun, informative, beautifully photographed.
I have shown this video to my class every year.  They really like the songs and gain much information from the video.  Just upgraded to DVD.

I bought this for my 2 year old grandson and he loved looking at it over and over.  It is set up so we could stop it at any point. I like the "true to life" photos, not some purple thing trying to entertain. In addition it is calm, but interesting, so when there was an unusual  level of activity at the lake, he could relax and watch a little of this with grandpa and fall off to sleep.
I teach preschool. It is great to be able to show them nature in an interesting and fun way.  They love Spin.

Dudly  Moor funny this  DVD will teach your kids and they will learn and have fun.
spin teachs with fun  Dudly  Moor is my favortie actor form the Uk
This is a wonderful DVD. It;'s educational and fun, and there are some great songs. My 1st grade children adore it.

My daughter just loves the whole series and this one is no exception Lots of fun catchy songs and the hilarious jokes with the perfect nature photography of national geographic is a must have for every child.

Our whole family has enjoyed these series.  My now-9 yr old loved it when he was two and still enjoys watching it with his 2 year old brother.  Our older son loves nature and animals and grew up on these National geographic kids videos, now in DVD format.  The songs are fun and catchy for the kids and a great way to learn about the world in a a fun way.  I think some people need to lighten up about the songs.  This is not supposed to be music from the National Symphony Orchestra.  These videos/dvd's are designed for children and they seem to really enjoy the funny songs.  We would love to get a CD of just the songs, because my husband and I enjoy them so much.
Excellent! Item came in a timely manner and was in great shape! Thanks so much!

noisy, obnoxious animated globe (Dudley Moore)
and horrible music mar this video. I expected
better from Nat'l Geographic.
My son liked the dvd.
Kids love it! Really interesting nature DVD that keeps kids attention with the little earth cartoon
I bought it for my grandson and he loves it.
Fun to watch.  Great for young children!
Very Good

Good video for kids however I had planned to use it as a homeschool supplement and it's just not detailed enough for that.  Covers some vocabulary which is nice but jumps from one animal group to the next without actually talking much about them.  Fun to watch just won't work for schooling.
This is a great video for younger students.  It's fast paced and engaging!
We enjoy and learn from it.
My nieces love it!
My nieces love it!
